import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../conponents/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen=({match})=> { const product=products.find((p)=>p._id===match.params.id) return (
Go Back

{product.name}
) } export default ProductScreen;
